name: Pinhead in Cube World
description:
Created in 72 hours for The Completion Jam hosted by Deynum

Jam theme: Out of Place

Pinhead is an assassin known for his distinctly shaped triangle head. Upon being captured by agents working for a Cube CEO, he plots both his escape and revenge.

Run and gun through cube-like levels, gun down enemy agents, and seek out the CEO that imprisoned you.
